item.title: By: derick.bailey

item.description: @Jason - Thanks! I'm glad it was useful and worth the $ :) if you have any questions or need any help, the google group is just a few clicks away: http://groups.google.com/group/albacoredev
item.content:encoded: @Jason – Thanks! I’m glad it was useful and worth the $ :) if you have any questions or need any help, the google group is just a few clicks away: http://groups.google.com/group/albacoredev

item.title: By: Jason Watts
item.dc:creator: Jason Watts
item.description: Great article. I actually subscribed to CODE just to read it - and it has already been worth the price of subscription just to see the examples of expandtemplates.
item.content:encoded: Great article. I actually subscribed to CODE just to read it – and it has already been worth the price of subscription just to see the examples of expandtemplates.
